name: Absolute Nonsense!
description:
This is a joint effort between myself (Saif Chowdhury) and Tucker Hortman. Its our first game jam ever and I hope you enjoy the insanity as much as we do!!

The concept is simple, at first. You play a girl at a barbeque who does battle with trashcans and other appliances carrying nothing but a torch you found and a magic shield that reflects projectiles. Your bullets are randomized and the enemies keep getting faster. 

The game is a true test of your dexterity.
